extendedInfo.description: Do you love procrastinating? Why do today what you can put off till tomorrow? That's the spirit! Do it (Tomorrow) is the todo app for you. Planning out your entire week is a bummer - Do it (Tomorrow) lets you give yourself reminders for today, but makes it really easy to push things off to tomorrow.Features: * Full virtual todo notebook experience * Fastest todo entry * Simple interface - just todo, just today and tomorrow * Easily check off tasks as completed or delete them altogether* Reorder and edit existing tasks* Takes advantage of the latest hi-res displays* Access and sync your tasks with the free web version at http://www.tomorrow.do - * you can add tasks from Google Chrome with an easy extensionAvailable Widgets for your Android Home Page (via In-App Purchase)* A 1x1 icon widget which just shows how many tasks are left for today* A 3x3 and a 4x4 widget to show you a quick view of your tasks for today and let you add tasks quicklyââ Related Apps ââYou can also get Do it (Tomorrow) for Kindle Fire: http://amzn.com/B008MB2MA0 (syncs via cloud sync) - more tablets support coming soonCheck out our new companion App for plans that go beyond tomorrow: Everyday Notes http://bit.ly/todayAppAndroidââ Important Notes: ââAccess the Sync and Font settings by pressing the menu button on your phoneSetting up sync:1. Press the menu button, select 'Settings'2. Enter an email and password to protect your tasks### NOTE To Do It Tomorrow FANS! ### Thanks a lot for your support and for the nice reviews! You are all awesome! We listen to you and are working on adding features you are missing! Reviewing the app helps us a lot, so thanks for the feedback and supporting Do It (Tomorrow)!If you want to talk to us directly or support the App, find us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/todoApp and Twitter: http://twitter.com/todoTomorrow

reviews.title: Simple but enough
reviews.comment: Very useful app, simple and easy to use, and with a nice look
reviews.author: David S\303\241nchez Gallego

reviews.title: Simple, I love it!!!
reviews.comment: I really like this app its so simple to use.
reviews.author: Daniela Lara

reviews.title: Fast and Easy
reviews.comment: What a great little app. No organizing, categorizing or prioritizing - which takes time. You either did the task today or you\'ll do it tomorrow. Just a simple reminder of what needs to be done. I love it!
reviews.author: Sondra Metts

reviews.title: Extremely cool app simple yet effective
reviews.comment: I love this app. I would have given it five stars if it had an option to go back and flip through previous task and maybe assign task priority for a day.  Other than that I love it!!!!
reviews.author: Kavassana Aanai

reviews.title: Simple, but works well.
reviews.comment: I love this app,  minus the inability to categorize or prioritize. I want to be able to take a look and quickly see what I should do next. Not perfect for me, but closest I\'ve seen!
reviews.author: Jade Summers

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I love it. The transfer option to tomorrow is wonderful and easy.
reviews.author: Laura Perkins

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: I like its simplicity. I can prioritize my list and add items for the next day and cross off what I\'ve done without deleting the task. Love it.
reviews.author: casey zvanut

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: For someone juggling a lot of tasks at once, this is the perfect little app to help make sure you stay on top of everything. It is also very aesthetically pleasing with its handwritten appearance. Simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: Remy Mitsui

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This app is perfect...exactly what I was looking for. Simple to use and never have to worry about remembering to remember a task.
reviews.author: Matthew Skoll

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Love this app. Simple, beautiful, useful. Can\'t say enough.
reviews.author: Matt Fasl

reviews.title: Helpful and simple
reviews.comment: Keeps me aware of todo lists without the pressure of time constraints.  I put my \"would be nice to get done but not crucial\" stuff on here.  Then when I feel inspired, I do a few of them.
reviews.author: jennifer burnleu

reviews.title: Widget is pointless
reviews.comment: The main app is very good.  Let down by the widget. You can\'t cross out tasks on the widget, which is a shame.
reviews.author: Sin Al

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: Great app, thoughtful and straitforward design. Now, let\'s get some new fonts, landscape mode, and change how long entries awkwardly carry over to the next page without you being able to see :D
reviews.author: Shane Kemmet

reviews.title: Categories and simple macros would help
reviews.comment: Very nice app. Better with work/home/play color coded and sortable categories. Some items will go to tomorrow most of the time. Can we flag these so with one touch they all move to tomorrow instead of one at a time? Not having dates and times to deal with is a VERY GOOD thing. Keep working on it and it will rank much higher.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff!
reviews.comment: Been using this for a few weeks and it\'s really easy to use and exactly what I need.  I don\'t plan weeks ahead I just need something for small things around work
reviews.author: Patricia Roberts

reviews.title: Very happy so far
reviews.comment: Can\'t really fault this app. I paid for it right away. Additional widget sizes would be awesome (4 x 3 for instance). Also an option to add how many days until X task needs to be completed and an automatic count down timer. I.e. exam in 10 days so every day that passes it counts down
reviews.author: Sean Tedi

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: This app is great, it has kept me on task so far and I haven\'t forgotten a thing. *update* this app would be perfect if I can check off tasks I\'ve finished on the widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and easy. No complicated setting.
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Just wish we can change font type. Very easy to use for quick reminder.
reviews.author: fraina manaloto

reviews.title: Never lets you forget
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for all those procrastinators who do not finish their tasks in a given day and then are too lazy to go back and refer their diaries/notes. Since the tasks are automatically carried forward unless ticked off, one just has to refer the current date. A reminder in notification area for days tasks can be helpful for those who don\'t remember to open the app.
reviews.author: Hitesh Shah

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Cool app. Very useful and easy to use.
reviews.author: Meghan Burke
